metadata.name: Sewing machine
metadata.description:
[h1]Repentance update is coming ![/h1]
Check the last changes to see the Repentance update 0.1 !
[h2]Pre-Repentance update[/h2]
New familiars upgrades, new cards, fix lots of bugs and better mod compatibility (including EID, Encyclopedia and Syringes!)
[h3]This update brings :[/h3]
[b]Familiar upgrades :[/b] New upgrades for : [list] [*]Dead Cat [*]Little Chubby [*]Lil' Spewer [*]Hallowed Ground [*]Holy Water [*]Dry Baby [*]Guppy's Hairball [*]Pointy Rib [*]Slipped Rib [*]Isaac's Heart [*]Milk [*]Depression [*]Samson's Chains [/list]
Remove upgrades for : [list] [*]Sack of Penny [*]Bomb Bag [/list]
[b]Mod compatibility :[/b]
[list] [*]Better EID support [*]Encyclopedia support. Familiar upgrade description will be accessible in the encyclopedia [*]Syringes! (see below) [/list]
[b]Pickups :[/b]
Naudiz and Wunjo runes have been removed
[list] [*]Warranty Card : spawn a Sewing Machine (same effect as Naudiz rune) [*]Stitching Card : Reroll familiar crowns [*]Familiar Buff syringe : Upgrade every familiars (same effect as Wunjo rune) [i](Require Syringes! mod)[/i] [*]Loner Essence syringe : Remove familiar crowns [i](Require Syringes! mod)[/i] [/list]
--------------------------------
[h1]Make your familiars stronger ![/h1]
The [b]Sewing Machine[/b] is a brand new machine which allow you to [b]upgrade your familiars[/b] during a run !
63 familiars are for now upgradable ! For more info about all those upgrades, check this link :
https://www.reddit.com/r/themoddingofisaac/comments/gwfffs/sewing_machine_mod_upgradable_familiars/
This mod include also new items and new trinkets related to the Sewing Machine.
This mod is NOT compatible with True-Coop !
--------------------------------
The sewing machine act like a slot machine. When interacting with the machine you will [b]add a random familiar[/b] in the machine. Interacting a second time with the machine will allow you to retrieve the familiar with a special upgrade. [b]Upgrades have a cost[/b], it can be a soul heart, or coins. When a familiar is in the machine, you can retrieve it when bombing the machine. Sewing machine can be found in [b]bedrooms[/b], [b]shops[/b] or [b]arcade rooms[/b]. Familiars can be upgradable twice. A crown icon indicate their level.
[b]Sewing Box[/b] / Active Item "Temporary super familiar" Upgrade all you familiars for one room
[b]Doll's Tainted Head[/b] / Passive "???" Every familiars will be SUPER. With Doll's Pure Body every familiars will be ULTRA
[b]Doll's Pure Body[/b] / Passive "???" Every familiars will be SUPER. With Doll's Tainted Body every familiars will be ULTRA
[b]Thimble[/b] / Trinket "Safety Crowns" Reroll familiars crowns when getting hit
[b]Cracked Thimble[/b] / Trinket "Cursed crowns ?" Have a 50% chance to reduce the cost for upgrades to half the normal price
[b]Lost Button[/b] / Trinket "More sewing machines !" 100% chance to spawn Sewing machine in Shops for next floors
[b]Contrasted Button[/b] / Trinket "Unexpected machine" 50% chance to find a sewing machine in angel rooms or devil rooms
[b]Pin Cushion[/b] / Trinket "Choose the good one" Interacting with the machine gives the familiar back
--------------------------------
[h1]Modded familiars[/h1] [b]Some modded familiars can work with the machine, including : [/b] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1991915308]Lost And Forgotten[/url] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1925867065]IPECAC Community Mod[/url] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=840727122]Marshmallow[/url]
--------------------------------
Please let me know if you encounter bugs !
Some familiars aren't upgradable now. This mod will be updated and will make more and more familiars available !
[b]Share your ideas[/b] in the comments or contact me if you have new ideas for familiars upgrades !
--------------------------------
Thanks to the Modding community for their help during the developement process
Special Thanks to - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198241259420/myworkshopfiles/]Foks[/url] for trinket sprites, ann's sprites and his support from the beginning of the mod - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198367241059/myworkshopfiles/]SupremeElf[/url] for the "Sewing Box" sprite, the code he made (mainly the EID compatibility) and his support - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/PixelPlz/myworkshopfiles/]PixelPlz[/url] for the awesome Sewing Machine sprite he made and the Angelic Sewing machine - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/ciirulean/myworkshopfiles/]Ciirulean[/url] for the evil Sewing Machine sprite - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198118097787/myworkshopfiles/]Sentinel[/url] for all his help and advices - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198394602416/myworkshopfiles/]Spore64[/url] for nice cards sprites
